name: Escape From Russia: Mobilization
description:
Originally Russian runner, in which you have to find yourself in the shoes of a poor piglet, running away from the military commissar with an agenda. Don't let the military commissar catch up with you, otherwise you will have to sign the agenda or go to jail, however, you can always agree.

Game features:

  • Infinitely generated world, because the borders of Russia has no end anywhere
  • Atmospheric locations, reflecting the real Russian hinterland, do not fall into a hole in the road
  • Tractor and other vehicles that Piglet borrowed will allow you sometimes not to run
  • A lot of items that helps in this difficult race
  • Coins with the image of the Emperor, which need to collect during races for upgrade items and bribes to the military commissar
  • Leaderboard with the most successful evaders (data will be transferred to the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation)
  • Patriotic music, you have to play while standing
